game.title: The Lost Temple of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient scrolls from the Lost Temple of Eldarath
game.description: The village elder has tasked you with retrieving the ancient scrolls from the long-abandoned temple. Legends speak of a powerful artifact hidden within its walls.
game.reward: A magical amulet granting resistance to elemental attacks and 1000 gold pieces

tasks.objective: Reach the Lost Temple of Eldarath
tasks.description: Make your way through the dense forest, avoiding goblin patrols and treacherous terrain.
Explore the temple, navigating traps and battling undead guardians to reach the scrolls.
